title: Executive Order 5795-Power-Site Restoration No. 468, Wyoming
content: So much of the order of July 13, 1911, creating Power-Site Reserve No. 190, as affects the lands hereinafter described, is hereby revoked:
citation: Herbert Hoover, Executive Order 5795-Power-Site Restoration No. 468, Wyoming Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/361400
